text: Application can be switched between [IMA, SPA and MPA modes](https://github.com/seznam/IMA.js-examples/blob/master/hello/environment.js#L42-L52){:target="_blank"} or combine them.
[Configuration](https://github.com/seznam/IMA.js-examples/blob/master/hello/environment.js){:target="_blank"} for all your environments in one place with inheritance.
Out-of-box REST API [localhost proxy](https://github.com/seznam/IMA.js-skeleton/blob/master/server/server.js#L116){:target="_blank"} with communication logging.
Advanced error handling for greater stability and faster development.
